verifyClaim(SortitionPool,BeaconInactivi.details: Group members hash is validated upstream in      RandomBeacon.notifyOperatorInactivity()

params.groupPubKey: Public key of the group raising the claim
params.nonce: Current nonce for group used in the claim

returns.inactiveMembers: Identifiers of members who are inactive

groupThreshold().notice: The minimum number of group members needed to interact according         to the protocol to produce a valid inactivity claim.

signatureByteSize().notice: Size in bytes of a single signature produced by member         supporting the inactivity claim.

verifyClaim(SortitionPool,BeaconInactivi.notice: Verifies the inactivity claim according to the rules defined in         `Claim` struct documentation. Reverts if verification fails.
